price: Dan kamu akan melihat kebanyakan dari mereka (orang-orang Yahudi) bersegera membuat dosa, permusuhan dan memakan yang haram425.  Sesungguhnya amat buruk apa yang mereka telah kerjakan itu.
arabic: وَتَرَىٰ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِ وَأَكۡلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحۡتَۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watarā kathīran min'hum yusāriʿūna fī al-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wāni wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
